mapper.select: select count(*) from dispcomment where cmtitle like #{searchtext}
select count(*) from dispcomment where cmcontent like #{searchtext}
select count(*) from dispcomment where cmuserid=#{searchtext}

select cmid, cmtitle,cmcontent,cmdisp,cmuserid,to_char(cmdate,'yyyy-mm-dd')cmdate,cmhits, prevId,prevTitle,nextid,nexttitle from (select cmid, cmtitle,cmcontent,cmdisp,cmuserid,cmdate,cmhits, lag(cmid,1,0) over(order by cmdate asc) prevId, lag(cmTitle,1,0) over(order by cmdate asc) prevTitle, lead(cmid,1,0) over(order by cmdate asc) nextId, lead(cmTitle,1,0) over(order by cmdate asc) nextTitle from dispComment) where cmid=#{cmId}
mapper.update: update dispComment set cmHits=cmhits+1 where cmid=#{cmId}
